Articles.Content:
Thanks for the well-wishes.

Well, I've gotten a trivial plugin to compile and run successfully, so that's the annoying infrastructural aspects out of the way. (And oddly it was way less of a fuss than the time I tried just making a new part model and had to mess around with Unity and blender for... too long.)

I'm gathering that backward compatability with existing planet packs would be something important to shoot for. I will try keep that in mind. Thanks.
I'm stuck at the moment, I don't know whether to ditch the system for Ovenproofmars due to the endless glitches that I have come across or just stay there until it is fixed.

I'm stuck at the moment, I don't know whether to ditch the system for Ovenproofmars due to the endless glitches that I have come across or just stay there until it is fixed.

Sharing is caring, you lose nothing by releasing.

If you want to get rid of all the tears, just add a big red warning saying it has known bugs and .... (nice censorship Squad) anyone that ignores that message.
The bugs can't be ignored, here's a pic of my attempt to add a gas giant with Starsystems installed. This gas giant worked perfectly without it.

Okay, so I don't anticipate having any time to work on this tomorrow, but I think I can do this project starting Thursday. Thinking of naming it Kerbig after the astronomer George Herbig, any other ideas before I've typed "Kerbig" too many times to rename it?

Thanks again for your input. I'll start a new thread for its development Thursday if nothing comes up.
Call it anthing BUT kerbig!
How about Kopernicus or Kepler?

How about Kopernicus or Kepler?

Kopernicus sounds promissing.

Update: I had some stuff come up today and didn't get to do much on this; will work on it tomorrow

Link to new thread for posterity: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168-Early-development-0-24-Kopernicus-Planetary-System-Modifier

Edited August 1, 2014 by BryceSchroeder

i need some help, im trying to make a gas giant but i keep getting this:

http://i.imgur.com/YQwdGkY.png

ive tried everything i can think of, i removed the heightmap, did nothing, remade the cfg, did nothing, etc.

can someone tell me whats wrong?

I get this for every planet I make BUT gas giants.... But planets I didn't make work fine.

Help please?

I have heard that none of the Planet Factory stars function with solar panels? Would it not make sense to locate that code with in the default star config file and use it in the stars for Planet Factory?

Does anyone know how to make oceans on planets? I cant seem to get mine to work

Take a look at Erin's config.

I have heard that none of the Planet Factory stars function with solar panels? Would it not make sense to locate that code with in the default star config file and use it in the stars for Planet Factory?

Even if anyone here can fix it, the license doesn't allow sharing of modified code. You can use StarSystems for functional stars.

My plugin: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68619-Plugin-WIP-KittopiaTech-Ingame-Terraforming-Tools-V0-174 , Contains a feature that adds the necessary fixes to stars. The only downside is that it is a requirement for the star "fix" to persist. It has slightly more functionality over StarSystems, but is much more complex and confusing. So, for your standard scenario: StarSystems is a great "star fixer", but for binary+ stars, with full custom colours, My plugin helps.

Just so were not commandeering this thread, the mod discussed for replacing Planet Factory's functionality now has its own thread. Comments about it should be directed there - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168-Early-development-0-24-Kopernicus-Planetary-System-Modifier

Hmm... Well it seems I was partially incorrect. Seems to be an issue with Hyperedit and PF not cooperating. This and HE seem to work fine on their own, but PF seems to be provoking Hyperedit into doing some rather unusual things, like creating a transparent overlay over the menu for some reason until the game is restarted. Here's a log if still interested. Right at 18:32:45.051 is where it happens (not sure WHAT exactly, but there it is).

http://pastebin.com/QPbQnLz1

I had the same problem but with Mechjeb2 and a ton of other mods, it worked fine once I deleted Mechjeb2. Although right now I'm making nothing more than a retextured, Minmus and as soon as I orbited it it turned into Minmus....

So i started messing around with this mod a little. Is there any way to vary the size of a Gas Giant or will they all be 6000 km Giants? PQS radius is not very liked by Jool Template. Is there a Sentar Template or anything to get a bigger Gas Giant?

So i started messing around with this mod a little. Is there any way to vary the size of a Gas Giant or will they all be 6000 km Giants? PQS radius is not very liked by Jool Template. Is there a Sentar Template or anything to get a bigger Gas Giant?

Gas giants do not have PQS. You only need to change their radius. I edited Dooz's Kaiser gas giant to be 1750 km...
Last time I checked that didn't work... At least for me. Can you show the cfg and an in-game image this would be absolutely awesome

A boring moon I made via Space Engine.

A slightly less boring gas giant I made from Space engine.
My computer can't run space engine

when i start up ksp all of the custom planet's texture's are broken skelton's model was replaced with duna's erin is replaced with laythe's and sentar is just gray with the word default plastered on it and the only planet's showing are the one's in the default plugin serious barry and stella are nowhere to be found does anyone know how to fix this am i missing a plugin or did i not install it correctly or what

This sounds like a bad install. Try just unzipping a fresh CE download, and moving what's inside the folder DIRECTLY into the KSP Game data folder you shouldn't have any problems. Welcome to the forums

when i start up ksp all of the custom planet's texture's are broken skelton's model was replaced with duna's erin is replaced with laythe's and sentar is just gray with the word default plastered on it and the only planet's showing are the one's in the default plugin serious barry and stella are nowhere to be found does anyone know how to fix this am i missing a plugin or did i not install it correctly or what

Are you using any other mods or attempted to edit cfg files I would use a CLEAN install nothing else just to keep in mind this mod is Mildly outdated..
ok that seemed to work the urania system seems to be missing but i can figure that out myself thank's
Urania is a DOWNLOADABLE PACK. Man people just don't get this mod...
